description: The day of T.L.Signal`s debut concert has come. But when Benzaiten entreats Kyouta to stop her, the boy makes this his priority. When Abuto loses control over Saraswati and she is running wild, Rumiko reaches a conclusion: She will bring back Yoriko-chan regardless of what it might cost her. But just when an unlikely alliance of several factions is about to defeat their mighty opponent Saraswati suddenly gets an unexpected protector. And Yokko makes up her mind.
